h2_title: Where to use Rice Cocoons in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Each of the Rice Cocoons can be used with the seeds you collect throughout your journey to grow new plants of the same name.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Rice_Cocoons.md', within the main section titled 'Rice Cocoons', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use Rice Cocoons in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Each of the Rice Cocoons can be used with the seeds you collect throughout your journey to grow new plants of the same name.
